name: Maria Car Service Workshop - A Funny Cars Wash Game for Kids – Kids Games Free
name_original: Maria Car Service Workshop - A Funny Cars Wash Game for Kids – Kids Games Free
description:
Maria has a very dashing car.
Her car met with an accident and so gets dirty and damaged.
Take that messy car into the virtual garage and use automative tools.
One of biggest service station of the Play town.
Wash your car with sponge and give bubble bath.
After finishing your clean up, start repairing it with car repairing kit.
Fix a car and get the tittle of “Best Mechanic” of your town.
Its free toddler educational game for kids to play and learn about automation parts and features.
Features:
=> Remove dirt with water and soap detergents.
=> Spray your car vehicle with different color paints.
=> Pour fuel into it to ride it far .
=> Polish your car, change tyres, headlights and go under the hood of car engine with maria in her workshop.
=> Varities of stickers and tattoos to decorate your dream car.

The ultimate car salon game for kids , drive through this service station and feel awesome ride with baby maria.
